cause.description:
to write love on her arms was started by some amazing people who want to help out loved ones who are struggling with depression. depression comes in all forms cutting, drug use, suicide attempts, etc. it is a huge problem amoung youth in the country as well as many adults.
lets all stand up and try to put a stop to this.
start caring, let people know your there. you may not think it will help but it will.
twloha is worldwide, they have many followers and band support. i hope that this group has your support to...
this is a big thing, so be apart of it. or sit back and watch, but you never know when someone you love could be suffering from depression..
1. depression and suicide is a real problem that isnt treated like a real problem amongst many people
2. someone is always there to talk.
The American Foundation for Suicide Prevention (AFSP) is the leading national not-for-profit organization exclusively dedicated to understanding and preventing suicide through research, education and advocacy, and to reaching out to people with mental disorders and those impacted by suicide.
